titleStmt.title: Description of Quaker & Special Collections, Rendel Harris 45: Thomas Aquinas treatises

msContents.summary: This manuscript contains various works of Aquinas, including Expositio devotissima orationis dominicae; Expositio devotissma super salutatione evangelica; Expositio devotissima super symbolo apostolorum; and devotions by later readers.

msItem.title: Thomas Aquinas, Expositio devotissima orationis dominicae
msItem.incipit: Incipit opusculum beati thome aquinatis videlicet. expositio deuotissima orationis dominice
msItem.explicit: et ad hoc remouendum petimus Sed libera nos a malo. Amen. Finis

msItem.title: Thomas Aquinas, Expositio devotissma super salutatione evangelica
msItem.incipit: Incipit aliud opusculum beati thome aquinatis. uidelicet. deuotissima expositio super salutacione angelica .t. Aue maria
msItem.explicit: Sed et magis benedictus fructus eius. Finis

msItem.title: Thomas Aquinas, Expositio devotissima super symbolo apostolorum
msItem.incipit: Incipit tertium opusculum eiusdem beati thome uidelicet deuotissima expositio super Symbolo Apostolorum. t. credo in de. pa. etc.
msItem.explicit: Ad quam uitam nos perducat do. ihesus christus. deus bene. in s. s. Amen. Finis est. Laus deo. Amen.

supportDesc.extent: iv+80+iv; 135 x 95 mm bound to 140 x 105 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Modern foliation in pencil upper corner recto at the following intervals: 11, 21, 30, 31, 35, 41, 51, 79; contemporary foliation in ink lower corner recto

layoutDesc.layout: Frame-ruled in hard point; single column of twenty-two lines; written area: 95 x 68 mm

decoDesc.decoNote: Four-line illuminated initials (fols. 5r, 30r, 35r); two-line initials in red and blue with pen flourishing throughout; manicules throughout

history.provenance: Signature of George Matthew on fol. 1r and on fol. 1v: "Delectare in domino Ipsi honor. et gloria in secula" with sketch for an initial I
